record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - October 25, 2007)

[Page: S13464]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Michael F. Burke, a fellow in the office of Senator Cardin, be granted the privileges of the floor during consideration of S. 294, the Passenger Rail Investment and Improvement Act of 2007.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
